nodes.documentation:
@title Main contract for controlling bots
 @author Doshmajhan
nodes.name: Controller

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the command for the bots to pull down
 @param new_command The new command to be stored
nodes.name: set_command

@notice Gets the current command stored for the bot to run
 @return The current stored command
nodes.name: get_command

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "This address has already been initialized"

arguments.value: This address has already been initialized

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "This address has already been initialized"

nodes.name: join
is_joined

params.bot_address: The address to check if it belongs to a bot

is_joined(address).return: True if join, false if not

params.ip: The ip address of the computer the bot is running on

join(string).return: True if the join was successful

params.new_command: The new command to be stored

get_command().notice: Gets the current command stored for the bot to run

is_joined(address).notice: Checks if the sender address is joined as a bot

join(string).notice: Joins a bot to our network with the given ip address and eth address     each bot is unique to its eth address it was intialized from

set_command(string).notice: Sets the command for the bots to pull down
